title: New: Sam Inc – I Like The Suburbs
content:
You’ve got to love the audacity of this girl, for several reasons: 1) Using a Beach House sample in your first ever track is fairly ambitious and bold.

2) With all the hatred and split opinions Kitty Pryde has caused, to present something extremely similar is likely to trigger a reaction, most probably negative. 3) That ‘artwork’.

Anyway, it’s easy to be confident sitting behind a computer screen, what of the actual music? Well, as previously mentioned, it is startlingly similar to everyone’s favourite ginger haired ‘rap’ Princess, Kitty Pryde, but hell, it’s kind of interesting. The lyrics are obscene and obsessional, yet somewhat appealing in their honesty. Whether or not Sam Inc is merely a parody of Kitty Pryde remains to be seen; either way, the entire ‘movement’ begs the question in my mind, is this the female response to Odd Future? Also, is it just me who is reminded of Bad Babysitter (below)?
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
